ModMetaData.name: Mort's Luciferium
ModMetaData.author: vonMort
ModMetaData.description:
This mod introduces new experimental variations of Luciferium, adding a sense of progression and crafting options:
- **Unstable Luciferium**: An early, unstable version of Luciferium offering basic mechanite enhancements. However, it is unpredictable and less effective compared to its refined counterparts. - **Refined Luciferium**: A more advanced and stable version with improved effects, though it still falls short of the perfection of pure Luciferium.
These new additions enhance the risk-reward dynamic of using and producing mechanites, making the mod perfect for players eager to experiment with the dangers and rewards of Luciferium!
